title: The Truth About Working in PR with Rachel Krupa
itunes:title: The Truth About Working in PR with Rachel Krupa
description:
Brooke is joined by Founder/CEO of Krupa Consulting and The Goods Mart, Rachel Krupa!  The two discuss working in PR, job application tips on how to stand out, and how she got started in her successful career!

Lavish Life Planners: https://lavishlifebrand.org/ 

Rachel’s Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rachkrupa/  

Krupa Consulting: https://www.krupaconsulting.com/  

The Goods Mart Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thegoodsmart
